name: Horizon (itch) (Echonox, sungwonson2, Jaydeveloper, garrisonf)
description:
The weather machine on the main island is broken, and stormy clouds surround you, blocking your travels. Complete the connected  puzzle islands  in order to fix the machine and part the storm.

Controls:

WASD: movement

Left Shift: dash

Space: interact

Credits:

Garrison Finley: Team Lead, Designer

Ryan Hartanto: Programmer, Artist

Jaydev Patel: Programmer

Sungwon Son: Programmer

Music from Dusty Dots
